fulltext:
1 
Resume 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
Full name: Nguyen Duc Nghia 
Email: bachhacden@gmail.com 
Phone: 0962.437.653 
Address: 678/40 Xa lộ Hà Nội, P. Tam Hòa – Biên Hòa – Đồng Nai 
PERSONAL STATEMENT 
I’m a software engineer with 8 years of experience in software outsourcing and product 
development (6 years as team leader). My experience and skill cover popular programming 
languages and technologies (Java, C++, PHP). 
My best skills include technical research, system analysis and design, software design, 
problem solving... 
WORKING EXPERIENCE 
03/2011 – 07/2018: Senior Software Engineer at Global Cybersoft 
Vietnam JSC 
Project list: 
09/2017 – 07/2018: Team leader at project FlexBA – Ecommerce 
Project summary: FlexBA is existed product of GCS, which is a retail management system. 
In this project, we develop an ecommerce site as a new sub-system for FlexBA. Site is 
developed base on an open source ecommerce platform. Ecommerce connect to FlexBA core 
for product/transaction data and integrated with payment gateway, and some identity 
providers. Ecommerce sub-system include a PHP website and a Java SpringBoot application 
(use for sync data). 
Responsibilities: 
 
Manage team: Break tasks, estimate and assign task to team members, monitor 
progress and report to line manager. 
 
Work with other teams and other vendor to find integration solution. 
 
In charge for important technical research. Decide solution for technical issue in 
project. 
 
Take part in system design for whole product and in charge for design of ecommerce 
site. 
 
Perform code review, design review and directly implement some functions (in Java). 
Technology: 
 
PHP (Symfony and custom framework), HTML/CSS/Javascript, Java (SpringBoot) 
 
DB: MySQL 
06/2017 – 09/2017: Technical leader at project CBRR 
Project summary: CBRR is a web system of JCB which will handle process cashback and 
retrieval. In this project, we implement some module for CBRR, other main modules are 
implemented by Hitachi Japan. Project is implemented in JSP and Java SpringMVC. 
Responsibilities: 
 
Define development process for team to work with onsite BSE and client. 
 
Read and analyse spec and design document to explain for members and make Q&A 
if needed. 
 
Review source code and unit test of team members. 
Technology: 
 
JSP, Java Spring MVC 
 
DB: Oracle 
2 
12/2015 – 05/2017: Team leader at project SEIBI (Onsite in Japan) 
Project summary: SEIBI is a very big system of Mizuho Bank which is planned to replace 
existed internal transaction handling system of this bank. Our team onsite in Japan and join to 
development team of Hitachi Japan. 
Responsibilities: 
 
Read design document and implement functions. 
 
Monitor and help other team members if there are technical issues. 
 
Study system architecture and development process, in order to build offshore team 
when possible. 
Technology: 
 
JSF, Java (J2EE) 
 
DB: Oracle 
05/2013 – 11/2015: Technical leader and Project Manager at project 
PDFFormStudio 
Project summary: PDFormStudio is a desktop application which is used to process PDF and 
create printing product (PDF). User can use PDFormStudio to create workflow to process 
their data. Product is required good performance, can handle job with millions PDF pages and 
images. Application is written by C++ MFC. 
Responsibilities: 
 
Design/implement core function of data processing service. 
 
Get requirements, analyse requirement and estimate task. 
 
Assign task, create plan, monitor progress of other team members 
Technology: 
 
C++ MFC in Windows, JAVA, Spring desktop application 
02/2012 – 11/2015: Technical leader and Project Manager at project Variable 
Frontend Service (VFS) 
Project summary: VFS is a SaaS web to print system, provides various printing business 
functionalities based on which user role logs in to the system: Advertiser, Graphic Designer, 
Commercial Printer. The VFS applies many cutting-edge technologies, HTML5/CSS3, jQuery 
at client site to provide rich user interface, multi-colour theme and multi browser features. It is 
designed to support multi-tenant environment and coordinates many advance technologies at 
server side to obtain high availability, scalability, reliability characteristics. 
Responsibilities: 
 
In charge for technical of Backend of this system. Design structure of system to 
integrate different server with different platform and technology. 
 
Design/implement core function of data processing server. 
 
Design and implement high availability deployment model (deployed on Amazon 
Cloud) 
 
Directly communicate with customer, get requirements, estimation and design when 
have new request. 
 
Assign task, create plan, monitor progress of other team members 
Technology: 
 
LAMP Solution: 
- 
Apache HTTP server version 2.2.x on CentOS Linux version 5.5 
- 
PHP version 4.x 
- 
MySQL Database server version 5.0.x 
- 
Symfony 1.4 
 
JAVA, Spring desktop application 
 
ActiveMQ + Camel 
 
Windows C++ and PDFLib 
09/2014 – 11/2014: Project Manager at project Primagest TWAIN driver 
Project summary: This project develops XML module of TWAIN driver for scanner machine 
of Primagest. XML module is a Windows DLL, which can read/write and calculate information 
from/to many XML files. 
Responsibilities: 
 
Analyze requirement and create estimation for project 
 
Create project plan and development strategy base on Test Driven development 
process. 
 
Create and assign task, monitor and control progress. 
3 
 
Review design and source code of team members. 
Technology: 
 
C++ Windows with MSXML. 
10/2011 – 11/2011: Developer at project Equios Online - RiteView 
Project summary: Equios Online is a Web2Print system, allow user to submit printing job to 
printing company. RiteView is a Java Applet inside Equios, used to view and check printing 
product before print. 
Responsibilities: 
 
Refactor and develop new feature for RiteView 
 
Develop test case and optimize performance. 
Technology: 
 
Java Swing in Applet. 
 
ASP.net webform with VB.net, MS SQL server. 
04/2011 – 09/2011: Developer at project Equios Client and Equios Server 
Project summary: Equios Client and Equios Server is management system for industrial 
printing. It is used to create printing job, process printing product, send printing product to 
printing machine. In this project, we upgrade version and add more feature for this product. 
Responsibilities: 
 
Analyze detail requirement, make detail design document. 
 
Implement and test. 
Technology: 
 
Desktop application with Java Swing. 
EDUCATION 
2006 – 2010 
University of Technology, Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam 
Bachelor of Computer Science Engineering – Honor Program 
REFERENCES 
References are available on request.  
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
